pullrequest.title: Update readme with info on optix installation

content.raw:
Not sure what's the best way to instruct users on fixing the optix build error. The note is just a short term workaround as the line numbers have not changed since optix 3.8.0. 

I'll need to think of a better way to fix the problem.
